plot: Alex is suffering from a deadly kidney disease. After he is kicked off the transplant list his dialysis nurse makes him an offer to buy a kidney on a black market. There is one catch, he has to find a donor.
title: Seconds
plot_es: Alex is suffering from a deadly kidney disease. After he is kicked off the transplant list his dialysis nurse makes him an offer to buy a kidney on a black market. There is one catch, he has to find a donor.
plot_en: Alex is suffering from a deadly kidney disease. After he is kicked off the transplant list his dialysis nurse makes him an offer to buy a kidney on a black market. There is one catch, he has to find a donor.
